Interface_name: Http client-side based on Java.io & HttpURLConnection
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a Java class that implements HTTP client functionality for downloading images and handling multipart form data submissions.

Class Description: The HttpClient class provides methods to download images via HTTP POST requests and to construct and send multipart form data (including both text parameters and file attachments) to a server. It handles connection management, request configuration, and response processing.

Attributes:
- url: String - The target URL for HTTP requests
- con: HttpURLConnection - The HTTP connection object
- os: OutputStream - Output stream for writing request data
- delimiter: String - Boundary delimiter for multipart form data (default "--")
- boundary: String - Unique boundary string for multipart requests (generated with timestamp)

Methods:
- HttpClient(String url) -> None - Constructor that initializes the client with target URL
- downloadImage(String imgName) -> byte[] - Downloads an image by sending the image name as a POST parameter and returns the image data as byte array
- connectForMultipart() -> void - Initializes connection for multipart form data submission
- addFormPart(String paramName, String value) -> void - Adds a text parameter to multipart form data
- addFilePart(String paramName, String fileName, byte[] data) -> void - Adds a file attachment to multipart form data
- finishMultipart() -> void - Finalizes the multipart form data construction
- getResponse() -> String - Retrieves and returns the server response as a string
- writeParamData(String paramName, String value) -> void - Internal helper method for writing form parameters
